name: Tarrasque
damage: 4d12+10 piercing (bite) or 4d8+10 slashing (claw) or 4d10+10 piercing (horns) or 4d6+10 bludgeoning (tail)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Uses Frightful Presence, then makes five attacks: bite, two claws, horns, and tail. Can use Swallow instead of bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: On hit, target grappled (escape DC 20), restrained while grappled; tarrasque can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Target DC 20 STR save or knocked prone.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.description: Creatures of choice within 120 ft. aware of it make DC 17 WIS save or frightened for 1 minute (repeat saves end, with disadvantage if in line of sight; 24-hour immunity after success/end).

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: Bites a grappled Large or smaller target; on hit, target is swallowed (blinded/restrained, total cover) and takes 56 (16d6) acid at start of turns. If it takes 60+ damage in a turn from inside, DC 20 CON save or regurgitate at end of turn; on death, swallowed can exit using 30 ft. movement, prone.

legendaryActions.name: Move
legendaryActions.description: Moves up to half its speed.
